wikipedia_page.main: Richard Mark Crossley (born 5 September 1970) is an English former professional footballer who played as a defender in the Football League for York City, in Hong Kong football for Michelotti and was on the books of Huddersfield Town without making a league appearance. Later he played in Hong Kong and China.

response: * Richard Crossley (born 1969), Maltese, English professional fashion photographer
